questions.question: Who was the first Prophet in Islam?
questions.explanation: Prophet Adam (peace be upon him) was the first human and the first Prophet.

questions.question: Who is the last Prophet in Islam?
questions.explanation: Prophet Muhammad (peace be upon him) is the last and final Prophet.

questions.question: Which Prophet built the Kaaba with his son?
questions.explanation: Prophet Ibrahim and his son Ismail built the Kaaba in Mecca.

questions.question: Which Prophet survived the great flood with his Ark?
questions.explanation: Prophet Nuh (Noah) built an Ark and survived the great flood with the believers.

questions.question: Which Prophet was swallowed by a whale?
questions.explanation: Prophet Yunus (Jonah) was swallowed by a whale and prayed to Allah for forgiveness.

questions.question: Which Prophet could talk to animals?
questions.explanation: Prophet Sulaiman (Solomon) was given the ability to understand and communicate with animals.

questions.question: Which Prophet was known for his patience?
questions.explanation: Prophet Ayyub (Job) was known for his incredible patience during hardships.

questions.question: Which Prophet could interpret dreams?
questions.explanation: Prophet Yusuf (Joseph) was blessed with the ability to interpret dreams.

questions.question: Which Prophet parted the Red Sea?
questions.explanation: Prophet Musa (Moses) parted the Red Sea to save his people from Pharaoh.

questions.question: Who was the father of Prophet Ismail?
questions.explanation: Prophet Ibrahim was the father of both Ismail and Ishaq.
